effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

short_effect.black_white: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.black_white: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
